summary: This bill, H.R. 873, amends Title 10 of the United States Code to modify TRICARE reimbursement rates. It mandates the Secretary of Defense to establish location-specific reimbursement rates for healthcare providers, differentiating between inpatient hospitals, outpatient departments, ambulatory surgical centers, and physician offices. The Secretary will generally pay the lowest authorized rate and must use unique provider identifiers linked to geographic locations. The changes are slated to take effect January 1, 2026.
